comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when preview the label with script in Onprepare method.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20061211-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a grid item.
2. Define highlight rule for its first row, choose font color red.
3. Input this.displayName=this.getHighlightRules()[0].color in onPrepare 
   method of the first row of the grid item.
4. Preview

Expected result:
No exception is thrown out.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
- There are errors evaluating script "this.displayName=this.getHighlightRules()[0].color". 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

If you open a design file, and get the getHighlightRule().XXX APIs, can it work well?

Verified in build (200612210630), closed.
Update Steps to reproduce:
1. Choose the report, in the Script tab, add "var a" in initialize method.
2. Insert a grid item in the Layout, input 
   " a="\""+this.getHighlightRules()[0].color+"\"" " in onPrepare method of the
   first row of the grid item.
3. Insert a data item in the Layout, set Expression as a.
4. Preview.

traces.message: The property "displayName" is invalid for element "null". (<inline>#1)
The property "displayName" is invalid for element "null".
